channel.description: Recent content in James Barbours on Music

item.title: James Barbours - Loving You Keeps Me Alive("Dracula"OST)
item.description:
Loving you
keeps me alive
Think again
before you leave me
His love
cannot be
As true as the love
I offer you
You’re wasting time
pretending
You belong to him
come to your senses
Loving you
keeps me alive
I’ll be in your heart
forever
And you’ll be
a part of me
From now
till eternity
You’ve talked yourself
into believing
He’s the one
such wild pretenses
The first time
I set eyes on you
I knew
I’d never be the same
I never knew
I’d get such pleasure
Whispering
your name
If loving you
keeps me alive
Then how can
leaving me be right
Turn back
and let me love you
Stay
with me
And let us dance
into the night
You are the one
the only one
To make me see
the empty life I lead
You are the love
the only love
I’ll ever
need
The first time
I set eyes on you
I knew
I’d never be the same
I never knew
I’d get such pleasure
Whispering
your name
If loving you
keeps me alive
Then how can
leaving me be right
Turn back
and let me love you
Stay
with me
And let us dance
into the night
